title: WatchMyPhone
summary: Excellent mobile-wear app to keep watch on your phone!

descriptionHTML:
You often forget your phone on office desk or at home. Watch My Phone is an amazing wear app that automatically alerts you when you are walking away from your phone.


'ZERO' percent phone loss probability. Now you will never lose, forget or misplace your phone. This app is the best preventive wear app that minimizes all your chances to lose your phone to 0%.


Features and Benefits:
- Priority is to keep your phone within your reach.
- Makes sure that you never forget your phone.
- Get an auto alert when you are leaving your phone or walking away from it.
- Manually ring phone from wear watch when it is out of your sight.
- Check the last known address of your Phone’s location within your watch.
- 'Ok Google' - Watch My Phone


Usability:
- Use Wear watch to find phone when in proximity by manually ringing it.
- Use wear watch to see the last known address of your phone’s location.


Specific Instructions:
Android wear watch is required to use this app.
Settings
- GPS and Internet needs to be enabled for the address tracking to work


Gone are the days to be a Watch-Guard for your phone. Watch My Phone does it all for you.
comments: Nice app, but... Using it with moto 360 and HTC one M7. It seems that GPS is running constantly with address tracking on. This will consume a lot of battery ðŸ”‹? And it is difficult to push Ring at the bottom of the Moto 360. At last I think it is a bit slow in detection of loss of Bluetooth.

Highly Recommended!! Guys, If you have a tendency to forget your phone at home while going out, or if you are like me who always has trouble to find your phone at home like sometimes it is under the mattress, or in the bathroom, etc., etc...  You surely need this app, and you will love it!! :)

Very clean UI Does what I would expect and looks good doing it. I would love to see this app get a feature that locks the phone when watch becomes disconnected and unlocks when reconnected. Otherwise great app to go with.
Moto360 Please optimize for the moto 360. The screen is cut off.

Cannot get to work Trying to setup on samsung S7 edge. Asked for the email address after stallation. When press submit, says 'No internet connection available' though it is connected to the internet. Cannot proceed further.

Works well... Battery hog Works very well. One of the best find my phone apps for wear... But it seems to be a big battery hog. It's always the leading cause of my low battery in the middle of the day.
